resources.string:
Aminas: 

 Fuentes-Mallozzi, D. A., Barreto-García, D. E., & de los Ángeles Garza-Yado, M. (2013). Cálculo de infusiones de fármacos inotrópicos y vasoactivos en pediatría. Pediatr Mex, 15(2), 49-53.

 Andropoulos, D. B. (2015). Anesthesia for congenital heart disease. John Wiley & Sons.


Anestesia Regional:

 Chu, L. F., & Fuller, A. (2012). Manual of clinical anesthesiology. Lippincott Williams & Wilkins.

 Rebollar, R. E., Palacios, M. G., Guerrero, J. M., & Morera, L. T. (2016). Bloqueos centrales en Pediatría: una revisión de la literatura actual. Revista Española de Anestesiología y Reanimación, 63(2), 91-100.

 Melman E, Arenas JA, Tandazo WE. Caudal anesthesia for pediatric surgery. An easy and safe method for calculating dose requirements. Anesthesiology 1985;63:3A,463.


Hemoderivados:

 Ayala Viloria, A. J., González Torres, H. J., & Tarud, G. J. D. (2017). Transfusions in paediatrics. Revista Salud Uninorte, 33(2), 187-201.

 Hillyer, C. D., Silberstein, L. E., Ness, P. M., Anderson, K. C., & Roback, J. D. (2006). Blood Banking and Transfusion Medicine E-Book: Basic Principles and Practice. Elsevier Health Sciences. p.524.


Fluidoterapia:

 Murat, I. (2006). 31 Perioperative Fluid Therapy in Pediatrics. Perioperative Fluid Therapy, 423.

 Green, J., & Lillie, J. (2017). Intravenous fluid therapy in children and young people in hospital N29. Archives of Disease in Childhood-Education and Practice, 102(6), 327-331.


Vía aérea:

 Wheeler, M, Cote, CJ, Todres, ID. The pediatric airway. In: Cote C, Lerman J, Todres ID (Eds). A Practice of Anesthesia for Infants and Children, 5th ed. Saunders-Elsevier, Philadelphia 2013. p.237.

 Walker, S. G. (2019). Smith’s Anesthesia for Infants and Children. Anesthesia & Analgesia, 128(2), e19.


PALS:

 De Caen, A. R., Berg, M. D., Chameides, L., Gooden, C. K., Hickey, R. W., Scott, H. F., ... & Schexnayder, S. M. (2015). Part 12: pediatric advanced life support: 2015 American Heart Association guidelines update for cardiopulmonary resuscitation and emergency cardiovascular care. Circulation, 132(18_suppl_2), S526-S542.
